subject: Baseball
Monuments and Memorials (Structures)
Awards, Decorations and Honors
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Royals have honored figures important to their history with statues at Kauffman Stadium, part of a trend in baseball that the Mets have ignored.
snippet: The Royals have honored figures important to their history with statues at Kauffman Stadium, part of a trend in baseball that the Mets have ignored.
